professional_summary: Detail-oriented software engineer with over 5 years of experience in full-stack development. Proficient in JavaScript, Python, and SQL, with a strong focus on building scalable applications and improving user experience.

achievements: Led a team of 5 developers to design and implement a real-time analytics platform, increasing client satisfaction by 20%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and meet project milestones on time.
Mentored junior developers, contributing to a 15% improvement in team performance.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs, reducing response times by 30%.
Worked with UX/UI designers to enhance the user interface, leading to a 25% increase in user engagement.
Contributed to Agile sprint planning, improving project efficiency and team coordination.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.description: Developed a scalable platform for real-time data analysis, integrating APIs and databases to support live dashboards.
